title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Transportation infrastructure development process, transportation modes, multimodal systems and interchange facilities, demand forecasting, capacity analysis, congestion management, mass transportation systems, pedestrian and parking facilities, traffic impact analysis, traffic safety, transportation economics, and economic evaluation of transportation projects
